title: Eve and Rengar
body:
Did you know?

When you are Eve and you know the enemy can see you, there is an exclamation mark above your head. This is the same exclamation mark used to warn you that Rengar is about to eat you, meaning that if Eve is visible, she cannot tell if Rengar is about to eat her.

replies.body: Eve has a range indicator for when shes about to be seen, she also has a red dot that glows above her head.
